name: The Lovers' Awakening
description:
After finding themselves awakening in the middle of a romantic fantasy induced by one of the Full Moon Shadows, Yukari Takeba and Mitsuru Kirijo find that the feelings of lust that drove this fantasy persist long after the Shadow is killed. They must now discover whether these feelings are legitimate or implanted by their deceased foe. All the while, Yukari rejects the notion that she has feelings for the heiress of the Kirijo Group due to what the Kirijo family has cost her.

The story is told from both characters' perspectives as they discover more about themselves and each other.

Their journey is brought to life by AI-upscaled art assets from the original game, the Persona 3 soundstrack and voice lines, and CG artwork from a variety of fanartists using the P3D models.

While the main story is complete, there are plans to add further supplemental chapters in future, along with general improvements as I better learn Ren'Py.
